casebody.data:
JOSEPH SAILER ads. THE STATE. Matter of Practice. Mr. Jeffers

applied for a Certiorari to remove into this Court, three indictments found against the defendant at the Gloucester General Quarter Sessions.

Mr. White,

Attorney-General objected to granting the writ, *358because the defendant has not appeared or pleaded to the indictments.

By the Court.

No step can be taken by a defendant on an indictment, until he submit himself to the jurisdiction of the Court.

Eyerson, J, also observed, That no motion can be made on an indictment, or in a civil action, by a defendant, without his previous appearance.

Application waived.
